abilities.name: Prehistoric Power
abilities.text: No more Evolution cards can be played. This power stops working while Aerodactyl is Asleep, Confused, or Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Freeze Dry
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Blizzard
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. If tails, this attack does 10 damage to each of your own Benched Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

abilities.name: Transform
abilities.text: If Ditto is your Active Pokemon, treat it as if it were the same card as the Defending Pokemon, including type, Hit Points, Weakness, and so on, except Ditto can't evolve, always has this Pokemon Power, and you may treat any Energy attached to Ditto as Energy of any type. Ditto isn't a copy of any other Pokemon while Ditto is Asleep, Confused, or Paralyzed.

abilities.name: Step In
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), if Dragonite is on your Bench, you may switch it with your Active Pokemon.

attacks.name: Slam
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 40 damage times the number of heads.

abilities.name: Curse
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may move 1 damage counter from 1 of your opponent's Pokemon to another (even if it would Knock Out the other Pokemon). This power can't be used if Gengar is Asleep, Confused, or Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Dark Mind
attacks.text: If your opponent has any Benched Pokemon, choose 1 of them and this attack does 10 damage to it. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

abilities.name: Transparency
abilities.text: Whenever an attack does anything to Haunter, flip a coin. If heads, prevent all effects of that attack, including damage, done to Haunter. This power stops working while Haunter is Asleep, Confused, or Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Nightmare
attacks.text: The Defending Pokemon is now Asleep.

attacks.name: Stretch Kick
attacks.text: If your opponent has any Benched Pokemon, choose 1 of them and this attack does 20 damage to it. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

attacks.name: Prophecy
attacks.text: Look at up to 3 cards from the top of either player's deck and rearrange them as you like.

attacks.name: Dark Mind
attacks.text: If your opponent has any Benched Pokemon, choose 1 of them and this attack does 10 damage to it. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

attacks.name: Absorb
attacks.text: Remove a number of damage counters from Kabutops equal to half the damage done to the Defending Pokemon (after applying Weakness and Resistance) (rounded up to the nearest 10). If Kabutops has fewer damage counters than that, remove all of them.

attacks.name: Water Gun
attacks.text: Does 10 damage plus 10 more damage for each Water Energy attached to Lapras but not used to pay for this attack's Energy cost. You can't add more than 20 damage in this way.

attacks.name: Confuse Ray
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Sonicboom
attacks.text: Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for this attack. (Any other effects that would happen after applying Weakness and Resistance still happen.)

attacks.name: Selfdestruct
attacks.text: Does 20 damage to each Pokemon on each player's Bench. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.) Magneton does 100 damage to itself.

attacks.name: Wildfire
attacks.text: You may discard any number of Fire Energy cards attached to Moltres when you use this attack. If you do, discard that many cards from the top of your opponent's deck.

attacks.name: Dive Bomb
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

abilities.name: Toxic Gas
abilities.text: Ignore all Pokemon Powers other than Toxic Gases. This power stops working while Muk is Asleep, Confused, or Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Sludge
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned.

attacks.name: Gigashock
attacks.text: Choose 3 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon and this attack does 10 damage to each of them. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.) If your opponent has fewer than 3 Benched Pokemon, do the damage to each of them.

attacks.name: Thunderstorm
attacks.text: For each of your opponent's Benched Pokemon, flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 damage to that Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.) Then, Zapdos does 10 damage times the number of tails to itself.

abilities.text: No more Evolution cards can be played. This power stops working while Aerodactyl is Asleep, Confused, or Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Confuse Ray
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Sonicboom
attacks.text: Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for this attack. (Any other effects that would happen after applying Weakness and Resistance still happen.)

attacks.text: You may discard any number of Fire Energy cards attached to Moltres when you use this attack. If you do, discard that many cards from the top of your opponent's deck.

attacks.name: Dive Bomb
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

abilities.name: Toxic Gas
abilities.text: Ignore all Pokemon Powers other than Toxic Gases. This power stops working while Muk is Asleep, Confused, or Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Sludge
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned.

attacks.name: Gigashock
attacks.text: Choose 3 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon and this attack does 10 damage to each of them. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.) If your opponent has fewer than 3 Benched Pokemon, do that damage to each of them.

attacks.name: Thunderstorm
attacks.text: For each of your opponent's Benched Pokemon, flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 damage to that Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.) Then, Zapdos does 10 damage times the number of tails to itself.

attacks.name: Terror Strike
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads and if your opponent has any Benched Pokemon, he or she chooses 1 of them and switches it with the Defending Pokemon. (Do the damage before switching the Pokemon.)

attacks.name: Poison Fang
attacks.text: The Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned.

attacks.name: Clamp
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed. If tails, this attack does nothing (not even damage).

attacks.name: Spike Cannon
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 30 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Lick
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Energy Conversion
attacks.text: Put up to 2 Energy cards from your discard pile into your hand. Gastly does 10 damage to itself.

attacks.name: Leech Life
attacks.text: Remove a number of damage counters from Golbat equal to the damage done to the Defending Pokemon (after applying Weakness and Resistance). If Golbat has fewer damage counters than that, remove all of them.

attacks.name: Psyshock
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Hyper Beam
attacks.text: If the Defending Pokemon has any Energy cards attached to it, choose 1 of them and discard it.

attacks.name: Selfdestruct
attacks.text: Does 20 damage to each Pokemon on each player's Bench. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.) Golem does 100 damage to itself.

attacks.name: Harden
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, whenever 30 or less damage is done to Graveler (after applying Weakness and Resistance), prevent that damage. (Any other effects of attacks still happen.)

attacks.name: Flail
attacks.text: Does 10 damage times the number of damage counters on Kingler.

attacks.name: Smokescreen
attacks.text: If the Defending Pokemon tries to attack during your opponent's next turn, your opponent flips a coin. If tails, that attack does nothing.

attacks.name: Smog
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned.

attacks.name: Water Gun
attacks.text: Does 20 damage plus 10 more damage for each Water Energy attached to Omastar but not used to pay for this attack's Energy cost. You can't add more than 20 damage in this way.

attacks.name: Spike Cannon
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 30 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Fury Swipes
attacks.text: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Water Gun
attacks.text: Does 20 damage plus 10 more damage for each Water Energy attached to Seadra but not used to pay for this attack's Energy cost. You can't add more than 20 damage in this way.

attacks.name: Agility
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, during your opponent's next turn, prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done to Seadra.

abilities.name: Strange Behavior
abilities.text: As often as you like during your turn (before your attack), you may move 1 damage counter from 1 of your Pokemon to Slowbro as long as you don't Knock Out Slowbro. This power can't be used if Slowbro is Asleep, Confused, or Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Psyshock
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Supersonic
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Jellyfish Sting
attacks.text: The Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned.

attacks.name: Smog
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned.

attacks.name: Selfdestruct
attacks.text: Does 10 damage to each Pokemon on each player's Bench. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.) Weezing does 60 damage to itself.

attacks.name: Spit Poison
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned.

attacks.name: Wrap
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Stone Barrage
attacks.text: Flip a coin until you get tails. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Nasty Goo
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Minimize
attacks.text: All damage done by attacks to Grimer during your opponent's next turn is reduced by 20 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Smokescreen
attacks.text: If the Defending Pokemon tries to attack during your opponent's next turn, your opponent flips a coin. If tails, that attack does nothing.

abilities.name: Kabuto Armor
abilities.text: Whenever an attack (even your own) does damage to Kabuto (after applying Weakness and Resistance), that attack does half the damage to Kabuto (rounded down to the nearest 10). (Any other effects of attacks still happen.) This power stops working while Kabuto is Asleep, Confused, or Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Call for Family
attacks.text: Search your deck for a Basic Pokemon named Krabby and put it onto your Bench. Shuffle your deck afterward. (You can't use this attack if your Bench if full.)

abilities.name: Clairvoyance
abilities.text: Your opponent plays with his or her hand face up. This power stops working while Omanyte is Asleep, Confused, or Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Water Gun
attacks.text: Does 10 damage plus 10 more damage for each Water Energy attached to Omanyte but not used to pay for this attack's Energy cost. You can't add more than 20 damage in this way.

attacks.name: Headache
attacks.text: Your opponent can't play Trainer cards during his or her next turn.

attacks.name: Fury Swipes
attacks.text: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Supersonic
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Hide in Shell
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all damage done to Shellder during your opponent's next turn. (Any other effects of attacks still happen.)

attacks.name: Spacing Out
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, remove a damage counter from Slowpoke. This attack can't be used if Slowpoke has no damage counters on it.

attacks.name: Scavenge
attacks.text: Discard 1 Psychic Energy card attached to Slowpoke in order to use this attack. Put a Trainer card from your discard pile into your hand.

abilities.name: Cowardice
abilities.text: At any time during your turn (before your attack), you may return Tentacool to your hand. (Discard all cards attached to Tentacool.) This power can't be used the turn you put Tentacool into play or if Tentacool is Asleep, Confused, or Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Supersonic
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Leech Life
attacks.text: Remove a number of damage counters from Zubat equal to the damage done to the Defending Pokemon (after applying Weakness and Resistance). If Zubat has fewer damage counters than that, remove all of them.

name: Mr. Fuji
rules: Choose a Pokemon on your Bench. Shuffle it and any cards attached to it into your deck.

name: Energy Search
rules: Search your deck for a basic Energy card and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

name: Gambler
rules: Shuffle your hand into your deck. Flip a coin. If heads, draw 8 cards. If tails, draw 1 card.

name: Recycle
rules: Flip a coin. If heads, put a card in your discard pile on top of your deck.

name: Mysterious Fossil
rules: Play Mysterious Fossil as if it were a Basic Pokemon. While in play, Mysterious Fossil counts as a Pokemon (instead of a Trainer card). Mysterious Fossil has no attacks, can't retreat, and can't be Asleep, Confused, Paralyzed, or Poisoned. If Mysterious Fossil is Knocked Out, it doesn't count as a Knocked Out Pokemon. (Discard it anyway.) At any time during your turn before your attack, you may discard Mysterious Fossil from play.
